info.title: Software Plan RP
info.description: Azure software plans let users create and manage licenses for various software used in Azure.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: The ID of the target subscription.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The api-version to be used by the service

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Get all hybrid use benefits associated with an ARM resource.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope at which the operation is performed. This is limited to Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines and Microsoft.Compute/hostGroups/hosts for now

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The api-version to be used by the service

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Supports applying filter on the type of SKU

200.description: OK - returns an array of plans at that scope

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope at which the operation is performed. This is limited to Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines and Microsoft.Compute/hostGroups/hosts for now

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier for a plan. Should be a guid.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The api-version to be used by the service

200.description: OK - returns the plan that is created

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create a new hybrid use benefit under a given scope

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope at which the operation is performed. This is limited to Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines and Microsoft.Compute/hostGroups/hosts for now

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier for a plan. Should be a guid.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The api-version to be used by the service

requestBody.description: Request body for creating a hybrid use benefit

200.description: OK - returns the plan that is created

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope at which the operation is performed. This is limited to Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines and Microsoft.Compute/hostGroups/hosts for now

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier for a plan. Should be a guid.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The api-version to be used by the service

200.description: OK - successfully deleted the given plan

204.description: OK - there was no plan to delete

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: Updates an existing hybrid use benefit

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope at which the operation is performed. This is limited to Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines and Microsoft.Compute/hostGroups/hosts for now

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier for a plan. Should be a guid.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The api-version to be used by the service

requestBody.description: Request body for creating a hybrid use benefit

200.description: OK - successfully updated the given hybrid use benefit

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Gets the version history of a hybrid use benefit

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope at which the operation is performed. This is limited to Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines and Microsoft.Compute/hostGroups/hosts for now

parameters.name: planId
parameters.description: This is a unique identifier for a plan. Should be a guid.

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The api-version to be used by the service

200.description: OK - returns an array of plans ordered by revision

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: scope
parameters.description: The scope at which the operation is performed. This is limited to Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines and Microsoft.Compute/hostGroups/hosts for now

parameters.name: api-version
parameters.description: The api-version to be used by the service

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed

message.description: A user readable error message. Localized based on x-ms-effective-locale header in the request

Error.description: Error object returned by the RP

ErrorCode.description: Defined error codes to be returned to the client.

nextLink.description: Url to get the next page of items.

etag.description: Indicates the revision of the hybrid use benefit

HybridUseBenefitModel.description: Response on GET of a hybrid use benefit

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource. Ex - /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}

type.description: The type of the resource. Ex- Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines or Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts.

nextLink.description: Url to get the next page of items.

ProvisioningState.description: Represent the current state of the Reservation.

name.description: Name of the SKU to be applied

Sku.description: The SKU to be applied for this resource

ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version
ApiVersionParameter.description: The api-version to be used by the service

PlanIdParameter.name: planId
PlanIdParameter.description: This is a unique identifier for a plan. Should be a guid.

ScopeParameter.name: scope
ScopeParameter.description: The scope at which the operation is performed. This is limited to Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines and Microsoft.Compute/hostGroups/hosts for now

PutBodyParameter.description: Request body for creating a hybrid use benefit
